presentation-product-page.all-supplier-info: All supplier information is hidden from the customer presentation.

confirmation-dialog-can-deactivate.unload-message: Would you like to save your changes before leaving this page?

confirmation-dialog-remove-image.message: Confirm removal. This image will be removed from your presentation. This image can always be added back to the presentation.

confirmation-dialog-save-click.title: Attribute Hidden
confirmation-dialog-save-click.message: You have included an attribute in the price grid that has been hidden in your presentation, which means it won't show to your customer. {{tag}} Would you like to change your settings and display this attribute on the presentation or continue saving?

confirmation-dialog-cancel.message: You have made changes to this product. Are you sure you do not want to save your work?

confirmation-dialog-delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this product?

confirmation-dialog-open-dialog.message: Would you like to save your changes before opening the preview?

product-details-image.image-upload-requirements: Images should be over 110px x 110px and under 2 MB in size.

product-details-images-selector.adjust-order-of-images: To adjust the order of your images, click Show all, then drag and drop the images in your preferred order.
product-details-images-selector.upload-helper-text: Images should be over 110px x 110px resolution and under 2MB in size. Allowed file types are .jpeg, .jpg, .png, .gif.

presentation-product-pricing.all-price-grids: Below you'll find all price grids for this product. We recommend adding based on the attributes you've selected above.

price-adjustments-labels.add-fixed-amount-to-price: Add Fixed Amount To The List Price
price-adjustments-labels.add-fixed-amount-to-net-cost: Add Fixed Amount To The Net Cost
price-adjustments-labels.add-fixed-amount-to-price-from-net-cost: Add Fixed Amount To The List Price From The Net Cost
price-adjustments-labels.subtract-fixed-amount-to-price: Subtract Fixed Amount To The List Price
price-adjustments-labels.subtract-fixed-amount-to-net-cost: Subtract Fixed Amount To The Net Cost
price-adjustments-labels.subtract-fixed-amount-to-price-from-net-: Subtract Fixed Amount To The List Price From The Net Cost
price-adjustments-labels.add-percentage-to-price-form-net-cost: Add Percentage Of The Net Cost To The List Price
price-adjustments-labels.add-percentage-to-price-from-price: Add Percentage Of The List Price To The List Price
price-adjustments-labels.add-percentage-to-net-cost: Add Percentage Of The Net Cost From The Net Cost
price-adjustments-labels.subtract-percentage-to-net-cost: Subtract Percentage Of The Net Cost From The Net Cost
price-adjustments-labels.subtract-percentage-to-price-from-net-co: Subtract Percentage Of The Net Cost From The List Price
price-adjustments-labels.subtract-percentage-to-price: Subtract Percentage Of The List Price From The List Price

confirmation-dialog-restore-to-default.message: Are you sure you want to restore prices?

presentation-product-price-visible-price.add-price-grid: Add a price grid or customize your price range.

presentation-product-price-invisible-pri.available-price-grids: Available price grids are hidden from the customer presentation until they are added.

presentation-product-price-range.determined-by-price: Determined by the price grid(s) selected above or you can choose to customize.

presentation-product-client-discount.display-indicator: Displays an indicator to the customer that the product is discounted for them.

presentation-info-card.presentation-not-viewed: Presentation has not been viewed yet.
presentation-info-card.link-not-shared-yet: This presentation has not been shared with the Customer yet.

presentation-quotes.changes-updated: Changes Automatically Updated in Project Details

presentation-settings-page.hiding-product: Hiding a product detail here will apply to all products in the presentation. You can choose to display the hidden information for specific items by editing the individual product and turning the option on.
presentation-settings-page.hide-product-details: Hide these product details on all items in your presentation.
presentation-settings-page.allow-customers-to-select: Allow customers to select product variants when requesting a quote
presentation-settings-page.personal-note-placeholder: Here are some products that I think you might be interested in!
presentation-settings-page.expiration-date-description: You can pick a presentation expiration date up to 90 days out. The default is set to 30 days.

presentation-preview.configure-your-presentation: Configure your Presentation and add products to see a preview.

presentation-products.click-on-product-to-edit: These products will be presented with the details above. Click on a product to edit its specific information.

no-products-message.no-products: There are no products in this presentation. Add products by starting a search.

share-presentation-dialog.send-email: Send email or copy link to share on your own.
share-presentation-dialog.enter-personal-message-placeholder: Enter a personal message that you would like to appear in your email.
share-presentation-dialog.signature-and-expiration-date: Signature and Expiration Date only apply to your presentation settings and not your email.
share-presentation-dialog.invalid-expiration-date: Expiration date is in the past. You must enter a future date.
